title: Comparative Study of Chinese and Japanese Mathematics Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pedagogical theory and understanding of comparative educational approaches
context.additional_context: Learners (students/job seekers) investigate pedagogical improvement strategies through comparative educational analysis in social studies. They engage in real-time collaboration and project execution using personal devices

learning_goals: Compare and analyze the commonalities and differences between Chinese and Japanese mathematics teaching methods
Systematically evaluate educational cases using a classroom observation framework
Propose a balanced approach between knowledge transfer efficiency and inquiry-based learning depth
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
